page.title: 20FUTURE DEVELOPMENT
page.content: Houses around Raunds will cost on average Â£20,000.There are going to be approximately 300 new houses to be built.At Titty Ho-light industry.Titty Ho is 0.74 hectares large and is linked to another plot of vacant land which is allocated for industrial purposes.Midland Rd.private development.Midland Rd.is 2.78 hectares large.It's been vacant for some time,it is an important archealogical site and has provided adequate examination prior to development in policy En3.Stanwick Rd.houses or bungalows.Stanwick Rd.is 5.00 hectares large.A portion of this site is owned by the town council and the remainder is for allotment use. Raunds Town Football Club-many objections,subject to change.Thorpe St.further development.Thorpe St.Maypine site-13 houses.
